levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 3+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (1 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage for 15% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (2 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 18% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 3)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (4 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'
- At 6+ Corresponding A-Reson., apply the above effects next turn as well

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 4 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 22% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., inflict 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Fragility'

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">12</style> SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and <style="highlight">1 [Curse]</style> on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">15</style> SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume <style="highlight">3</style> [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and 1 [Curse] on <style="highlight">3</style> random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [AzureTakeDamageUp]. At 3+ Gloom Reson., inflict 1 additional [AzureTakeDamageUp]

levelList.name: Solemn Lament
levelList.desc:
When this Skill flips Coins, each Coin flips against a random enemy among its targets.
- The first Coin always targets the main target.
- All 'On Hit' effects and all damage dealt by each Coin are inflicted only against the random target the Coin selected.
When inflicting [SinkingWhite] with this Skill effects: (Chance to flip Heads)% chance to inflict The Departed. If this unit did not inflict The Departed, inflict The Living instead. (calculates every [SinkingWhite] stack independently)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] At 0+ SP, Reuse this Coin (5 times max per Skill)

levelList.name: Unbrilliant Glory - Flowing
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
When used for the first time in battle, consume 1 fewer Wrath, 2 fewer Sloth, and 1 fewer Pride E.G.O resources.
At 1+ [MlynarWaiting], activate <noparse>Unbrilliant Glory - Incandescence</noparse> instead
This Skill does not hit an enemy, does not trigger Defense Skills, and external effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [MlynarWaiting]
[EndSkill] Heal 25 SP
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn

[EndSkill] Heal 25 SP

levelList.name: Unbrilliant Glory - Incandescence
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
At 40 [MlynarWaiting], becomes Clashable
[WhenUse] At 40 [MlynarWaiting], until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage, and gains Clash Power +20

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [MlynarWaiting] and gain the following effects(all of them rounded down):
- For every (Stack consumed / 20), recuperate 1 E.G.O resource (in the following order: Pride, then Wrath)
- For every (Stack consumed / 10), gain +1 Atk Weight (max 4)
- For every (Stack consumed / 10), gain [DefenseUp] (once per turn)
- If 40 Stack was consumed, the 4th Coin deals +50% damage, and this unit gains 2 [Protection] (once per turn)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +5% damage for every 8 ([Combustion] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 25%)
[EndSkill] Heal 5 SP for every target that was Staggered or killed due to this Skill's damage (max 25)
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [MlynarWaiting]
[EndBattle] If this Skill did not consume 40 [MlynarWaiting], the leftmost Skill Slot on the Dashboard gains +4 [Aggro] next turn (once per turn)

coindescs.desc: Reuse this Coin (([MlynarWaiting] Stack consumed / 10) - 1) times (3 times max)
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If this is the final Coin, and if target has 15+ [Vibration] Potency, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If this Coin was used 4 times, deal Sloth damage equal to [Vibration] on target (max 5)
